requirement_text: Financial institutions must protect customer information against unauthorized access.
expanded_text: Protect customer data from unauthorized access or use.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must develop and implement a written information security plan.
expanded_text: Create and follow a written plan to secure customer information.

requirement_text: Customer data must be collected and used only for legitimate business purposes.
expanded_text: Only collect and use customer data for valid business reasons.
tags: data collection, purpose limitation, business use

requirement_text: Financial institutions must ensure proper employee training on data privacy.
expanded_text: Train employees regularly on privacy and security rules.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must oversee service providers to ensure they protect customer information.
expanded_text: Make sure vendors protect customer data properly.
tags: third-party oversight, vendor management, data protection

requirement_text: Financial institutions must limit access to customer information to authorized personnel.
expanded_text: Only allow authorized staff to access customer data.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must regularly test and monitor information security systems.
expanded_text: Regularly check and test security systems for risks.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must have procedures for detecting and responding to security incidents.
expanded_text: Have processes to detect and respond to security problems.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must notify customers of their privacy policies and practices.
expanded_text: Inform customers about privacy policies and practices.

requirement_text: Customers must be given the right to opt out of information sharing with nonaffiliated third parties.
expanded_text: Allow customers to refuse sharing their data with outside parties.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must protect against anticipated threats to customer information security.
expanded_text: Identify and guard against likely security threats.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must protect against unauthorized access to customer information in electronic and physical forms.
expanded_text: Secure customer data both electronically and physically.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must encrypt sensitive customer information during transmission and storage.
expanded_text: Use encryption to protect sensitive data in transit and at rest.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must maintain records of compliance activities.
expanded_text: Keep detailed records of compliance efforts.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must implement procedures to evaluate the effectiveness of their information security program.
expanded_text: Regularly check if security programs work well.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must establish safeguards for customer information when disposing of records.
expanded_text: Securely dispose of customer data when no longer needed.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must limit customer information collection to what is necessary.
expanded_text: Collect only the customer data that is needed.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must develop policies for managing changes to their information security program.
expanded_text: Create policies for updating the security program.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must implement secure user authentication mechanisms.
expanded_text: Use strong methods to verify user identities.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must maintain physical security controls to protect customer information.
expanded_text: Keep physical access to data secure.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must maintain security controls over network and infrastructure.
expanded_text: Protect networks and systems from threats.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must identify reasonably foreseeable internal and external risks.
expanded_text: Recognize potential risks inside and outside the organization.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must provide annual training to staff on privacy and security requirements.
expanded_text: Give yearly training on privacy and security rules.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must designate an individual to coordinate the information security program.
expanded_text: Assign a person to manage the security program.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must monitor and manage security incidents.
expanded_text: Track and handle security incidents effectively.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must notify regulatory authorities in case of certain breaches.
expanded_text: Report data breaches to regulators as required.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must ensure that their policies comply with federal and state privacy laws.
expanded_text: Make sure policies follow all privacy laws.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must provide consumers with annual privacy notices.
expanded_text: Send yearly privacy notices to consumers.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must safeguard customer information from unauthorized disclosure.
expanded_text: Prevent unauthorized sharing of customer data.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must implement controls for managing third-party service providers.
expanded_text: Control risks related to third-party service providers.
